name: recxpcld
params: class c0, class c1, wff w0

stmt.origin: syl3anc(w0, wcel(co(c0, ccxp, c1), cr), wcel(c0, cr), wbr(nat0, cle, c0), wcel(c1, cr))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(co(c0, ccxp, c1), cr))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cr))
-| wi(w0, wbr(nat0, cle, c0))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cr))
-| wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cr), wbr(nat0, cle, c0), wcel(c1, cr)), wcel(co(c0, ccxp, c1), cr))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(co(c0, ccxp, c1), cr))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cr))
-| wi(w0, wbr(nat0, cle, c0))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cr))
-| wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cr), wbr(nat0, cle, c0), wcel(c1, cr)), wcel(co(c0, ccxp, c1), cr))

body.origin: |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cr), wbr(nat0, cle, c0), wcel(c1, cr)), wcel(co(c0, ccxp, c1), cr))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(co(c0, ccxp, c1), cr))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cr))
-| wi(w0, wbr(nat0, cle, c0))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cr))

comment: Positive real closure of the complex power function. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 30-May-2016.)
